line_1: Thy hand the dews so neatly threads
line_2: There as thy lightsome foot thus treads

line_1: And playful Agates weave their colour'd threads;
line_2: Soft cobweb clouds transparent Onyx spreads,

line_1: In living net-work all its branching threads;
line_2: O'er each red cell, and tissued membrane spreads

line_1: Descend, ye Spiders, on your lengthen'd threads;
line_2: Glitter, ye Glow-worms, on your mossy beds;
